GAS and GAS ext.from sentence:
English all - words results
GAS and GAS ext achieves the state - of - theart performance on the concatenation of all test datasets .

GAS ext.from sentence: Although there is no one system always performs best on all the test sets 10 , we can find that GAS ext with concatenation memory updating strategy achieves the best results 70.6 on the concatenation of the four test datasets .

multiple passes operation.from sentence:
Multiple Passes Analysis
It shows that multiple passes operation performs better than one pass , though the improvement is not significant .

appropriate number of passes.from sentence: It shows that appropriate number of passes can boost the performance as well as avoid over - fitting of the model .

increasing.from sentence: In Table 3 , with the increasing number of passes , the F1 - score increases .

number of passes.from sentence: However , when the number of passes is larger than 3 , the F1- score stops increasing or even decreases due to over-fitting .
